ModMetaData.name: RimRancher
ModMetaData.author: Door
ModMetaData.description:
RimRancher v0.0.1

SlimeRancher in RimWorld. v0.1 Contains broken versions of Pink and Tabby Slimes. Trello Board to come.

SlimeRancher is a wonderful game developed and published by Monomi Park.
@monomipark on Twitter 
monomipark.com
slimerancher.com 
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/433340/Slime_Rancher/

Huge shoutout to the Vanilla Animals Expanded -- Endangered Mod (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2366589898). As my first mod, their work came in very handy providing a straigtforward mod that was easier to understand than the Rimworld Core definitions and types.
